Name: Olimdal
About the game: Olimdal is a simple, yet challenging puzzle game with beautiful interior environments, set in the authentic library tower of Olimdal. The game is about a little wizard who got himself into a little trouble when trying to cast a spell from an unknown book. Spell made wizard's movements affect the movement of the surrounding objects. To break the spell you must find a tome from the highest room of Olimdal. In order to reach the tome room, you must get pass all the rooms while solving puzzles caused by your condition. Olimdal introduces fresh take on a simple puzzle element, movement. You must solve the movement based puzzles and challenges by moving or trying to move.
